@graph.title: Supermacroporous cryogels : biomedical and biotechnological applications
@graph.abstract: Cryogels and related research : a glance over last few decades / Deepak Bushan Raina and Ashok Kumar -- Synthesis and characterization of cryogels / Apeksha Damania, Arun Kumar Teotia, Ashok Kumar -- Production of synthetic cryogels and the study of porosity thereof / Irina N. Savina and Igor Yu. Galaev -- Fabrication and characterization of cryogel beads and composite monoliths / Junxian Yun, Linhong Xu, Dong-Qiang Lin, Kejian Yao and Shan-Jing Yao -- Cryogel tissue phantoms with uniform elasticity for medical imaging / Azizeh-Mitra Yousefi, Corina S. Drapaca, Colin J. Kazina -- Cryogels in regenerative medicine / Irina N. Savina, Rostislav V. Shevchenko, Iain U. Allan, Matthew Illsley, and Sergey V. Mikhalovsky -- Biocompatibility of macroporous cryogel materials / Akhilesh Kumar Shakya and Ashok Kumar -- Cryogel biomaterials for musculoskeletal tissue engineering / Ruchi Mishra, Sumrita Bhat and Ashok Kumar -- Cryogels for neural tissue engineering / Tanushree Vishnoi and Ashok Kumar -- Supermacroporous cryogels as scaffolds for pancreatic islet transplantation / Y Petrenko, A Petrenko, P Vardi, K Bloch -- Enzymatic biocatalysts immobilized on/in the cryogel-type carriers / Elena N. Efremenko, Ilya V. Lyagin, Vladimir I. Lozinsky -- Application of cryogels in water and wastewater treatment / Linda Önnby -- Cryogels in high throughput processes / Joyita Sarkar, Ankur Gupta, Ashok Kumar -- Cryogels : applications in extracorporeal affinity therapy / Handan Yavuz, Nilay Bereli, Gözde Baydemir, Mü̈ge Andaç, Deniz Tü̈rkmen, Adil Denizli -- Cryogel bioreactor for therapeutic protein production / Era Jain and Ashok Kumar -- Supermacroporous functional cryogel stationary matrices for efficient cell separation / Akshay Srivastava, Samarjeet Singh and Ashok Kumar
